de.mrapp.android.dialog.view

Interface ScrollView.ScrollListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ScrollView

    public static interface ScrollView.ScrollListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when the scroll view is scrolled, must implement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onScrolled(boolean scrolledToTop, boolean scrolledToBottom)
      The method, which is invoked, when the scroll view has been scrolled.

    • Method Detail

      • onScrolled

        void onScrolled(boolean scrolledToTop,
                boolean scrolledToBottom)
        The method, which is invoked, when the scroll view has been scrolled.
        Parameters:
        scrolledToTop - True, if the scroll view is scrolled to the top, false otherwise
        scrolledToBottom - True, if the scroll view is scrolled to the bottom, false otherwise
